hero.title: Professional Movers You Can Trust
hero.subtitle: Your reliable partner for local and long-distance moves. We handle your belongings with care and precision.

about.title: About Prime Move
about.storyContent: With years of experience in the moving industry, Prime Move has established itself as a trusted partner for families and businesses. We understand that moving can be stressful, which is why we're committed to making your relocation as smooth and hassle-free as possible.
about.impactContent: We've successfully completed over 10,000 moves, helping families and businesses transition to their new spaces with confidence. Our track record speaks for itself - 99% customer satisfaction rate and zero damage claims in the past year.
about.missionContent: Our mission is to provide exceptional moving services that exceed expectations. We believe every move is a new beginning, and we're here to make that transition as seamless as possible for our clients.

whyUs.title: Why Choose Prime Move?
whyUs.licensedDesc: Fully licensed and insured for your peace of mind.
whyUs.experiencedDesc: Professional movers with years of experience.
whyUs.transparentDesc: No hidden fees, upfront pricing you can trust.
whyUs.ctaDesc: Contact us for a personalized moving estimate.

services.title: Our Services
services.residentialDesc: Complete home moving services with professional packing and unpacking.
services.commercialDesc: Office relocations with minimal downtime and maximum efficiency.
services.packingDesc: Professional packing with high-quality materials and careful handling.
